english.segment1: In You we're living. In You we're moving. In You we're finding who we are
english.segment2: In You we're living. In You we're moving. In You we're finding who we are
english.segment3: And I worship You. Father of lights, spirit of truth. And I worship You. Jesus, we call on You, yes we call on You
english.segment4: In You we're living. In You we're moving. In You we're finding who we are
english.segment5: In You we're living. In You we're moving. In You we're finding who we are
english.segment6: And I worship You. Father of lights, spirit of truth. And I worship You. Jesus, we call on You, yes we call on You
english.segment7: And I worship You. Father of lights, spirit of truth. And I worship You. Jesus, we call on You, yes we call on You
english.segment8: We come to worship with our voices. And know the love within Your skies. We lift our hands and seek Your presence. And find ourselves in who You are
english.segment9: And I worship You. Father of lights, spirit of truth. And I worship You. Jesus, we call on You, yes we call on You
english.segment10: And I worship You. Father of lights, spirit of truth. And I worship You. Jesus, we call on You, yes we call on You
